original: 汝南郡人，東吳官員。自稱孫權舊部，乞官孫皓。任官期間作威作福，又因私怨誣告同僚。後劣跡敗露，被孫皓下令誅殺。
text: Runan County, Soochow official. Claims to be Sun Quan's old ministry, beggar Sun Hao. During his tenure as an official, he was domineering and falsely accused his colleagues because of private grievances. After the misdeeds were revealed, Sun Hao ordered to be killed.
